name: Lost sleep
description:
You have awoken from cryo sleep. Your memories are foggy, why did you enter cryo sleep to begin with?

Discover who you are, where you are, and decide how to move on.

A choose your own adventure game created for Gameboy Jam 5.

Change log:

Version 1.0.2: Fixed bug: When the text speed is set to instant the text sound continues forever Fixed bug: The main menu options doesn't update if you changed a option in the play menu Changed: Added a slight drop shadow to the logo Version 1.0.1: Fixed: Spelling/Grammatical errors! Fixed bug: The missing driver issue on windows Fixed bug: The text wouldn't be fully written out Fixed bug: The scroll field in multi-choice questions would start too low Version 1.0.0: Initial release
